description: Enumerates installed programs from HKLM/HKCU (incl. WOW6432Node), flags VPNs, user-scope/AppData installs, unknown publishers, and unsigned uninstall binaries. Outputs NDJSON (summary + per-program) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the scriptâ€™s human-readable log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
